item.title: Git Branching and Merging
item.description: In git one of the most powerful things is the possibilities for working collaboratively. This can be achieved with with a few features built into git.

item.title: IDE setup for javascript
item.description: When you start coding. It’s important to set up your environment for coding correctly. This is often referred to as a Development Environment.

item.title: Project Management
item.description: Lesson Plan Importance of project management for animation students What is a pipeline? Importance of project conventions. Style Guides for project management File formats Version control and backups Communication and working in a team Production Phases of a typical project
